T01D1153:195a-1: shr'i m'a nma h'a bo dhi bha tt'a ra ka sya sto tram /
T01D1153:195a-3: dpal ldan rje btsun byang chub chen po'i bstod pa /
T01D1153:195a-5: pad dkar spyan mnga' rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T01D1153:195a-6: thugs rje'i go 'phang thams cad mkhyen //
T01D1153:195a-7: sh'akya seng ge kun du bzang //
T01D1153:195a-8: ston pa la ni bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1153:195a-9: dpal stug dpal ldan gtso bo ste //
T01D1153:195a-10: zhi mdzad tshul khrims phung po can //
T01D1153:195a-11: zhi ba dpal ldan dpal mdzad pa //
T01D1153:195a-12: zhi ba'i sku mngar bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1153:195a-13: grub pa bdag med gsung mdzad pa //
T01D1153:195a-14: kha na ma tho'i gnas ma mchis//
T01D1153:195a-15: lugs mkhyen dri ma mi mnga'i bdag / rnyog mi mnga' la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1153:195a-16: 'gran zla nga rgyal mi mnga' zhing //
T01D1153:195a-17: rnam rtog mi mnga' de bzhin gshegs //
T01D1153:195a-18: nyon mongs kun gyis mi bsgul pa //
T01D1153:195a-19: spros mi mnga' la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1153:195a-20: sna tshogs dbang phyug rnam grol mkhyen //
T01D1153:195a-21: sna tshogs gzugs can rnam par 'dren //
T01D1153:195a-22: sna tshogs mtshan rnams yang dag rdzogs //
T01D1153:195a-24: gdul dka' 'dul mdzad sems can mchog / dag pa thub pa zas gtsang sras //
T01D1153:195a-25: bde gshegs legs rtogs zhi mdzad pa //
T01D1153:195a-26: dge bar grags la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1153:195a-27: rnyog pa las grol 'dod pa'i dgra / rnyog pa mi mnga' pad+ma 'chang //
T01D1153:195a-28: mdzes pa'i sku mnga' thugs brtse'i snod //
T01D1153:195a-30: blo gros chen po brtson 'grus che //
T01D1153:195a-31: stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po //
T01D1153:195a-32: mchod pa chen po bstan pa che //
T01D1153:195a-33: sgra gcan chen por bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1153:195a-34: rig dang zhabs ni phun sum tshogs //
T01D1153:195a-35: sna tshogs dbang po dri med 'od //
T01D1153:195a-36: rnam dul cha byad yangs pa can //
T01D1153:195a-37: skyon dang bral la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1153:195a-38: 'phags pa gtsang mdzad kun la sman //
T01D1153:195a-39: gzhan gyis mi thub nyams mi mnga' //
T01D1153:195a-40: bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i mgon //
T01D1153:195a-42: lha yi lha ste lha chen po //
T01D1153:195a-43: lha yis phyag byas zad mi mnga' //
T01D1153:195a-44: tshad mar gyur pa lha yi dbang //
T01D1153:195a-45: lha rdzas gzugs mngar bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1153:195a-46: don dam mchog tu gsal mdzad pa //
T01D1153:195b-0: @195b mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa ste //
T01D1153:195b-1: mchog tu gzhan la phan mdzad pa //
T01D1153:195b-2: bcom ldan de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1153:195b-3: bdud bzhi'i dgra las rnam par rgyal //
T01D1153:195b-4: zhi ba zhi mdzad de nyid mkhyen //
T01D1153:195b-5: de nyid snying bo rtag tu spyod //
T01D1153:195b-6: ded dpon la ni bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1153:195b-7: dbang po thul ba nyon mongs thul //
T01D1153:195b-8: rgyal ba'i dbang po skyes bu mchog / tshangs pa dam pa mchog gyur pa //
T01D1153:195b-9: bsod nams zhing la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1153:195b-11: khyod kyi sku nyid la bstod pas //
T01D1153:195b-12: dmyal ba'i me nang gnas pa rnams //
T01D1153:195b-13: bsil ba'i gnas ni thob gyur cig /
T01D1153:195b-14: dpal ldan rje btsun byang chub chen po'i bstod pa mchog sred kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o //
T01D1153:195b-15: 'di yang gangs can skad nyid du //
T01D1153:195b-16: rje btsun sprul pa'i sku mchog gi //
T01D1153:195b-17: bka' bzhin zha lu lo ts'a ba //
